name: What is C? (C kya hai?)
message:
'C' ek general-purpose programming language hai, jo system programming, game development, embedded software, and various other applications ke liye bahut-sare platforms par istemaal ki jaati hai. Yeh 1972 mein Dennis Ritchie ne C programming language ke through CAPS (C Reflection Analysis and Programming System) project ke dauran banaya gaya tha. C++, C#, Objective-C, Java, JavaScript, PHP, etc. bahut se programming languages C ke concepton ko inherit kiya hai.

 C programming language mein, variables, arrays, strings, loops, conditionals, functions, pointers, structures, etc. sabse jyada istemaal kiye jate hai. Yeh procedural programming ke roop mein kaam karta hai, lekin object-oriented programming ke concepts bhi support karta hai. C ko compiler-based language kehte hai, kyunki isme code compiler se compile kiya jata hai aur machine code ke roop mein chala jata hai.
